title: PSP FIELDS 1 minute cadence Fluxgate Magnetometer (MAG) data in RTN coordinates - Stuart D. Bale (bale@berkeley.edu) (UC Berkeley Space Sciences Laboratory)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'epoch_mag_RTN_1min' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/psp/fields/l2/mag_rtn_1min/2018/psp_fld_l2_mag_rtn_1min_20181002_v02.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 100.0000% of the 790 timesteps. Cadence = 60000000000 [ns] = PT1M.
info.contact: Stuart D. Bale (bale@berkeley.edu) @ UC Berkeley Space Sciences Laboratory

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Time in TT2000 for 1 minute cadence MAG waveform data

parameters.name: psp_fld_l2_mag_RTN_1min
parameters.description: Magnetic field in RTN coordinates (1 minute cadence)

bins.name: component_index_RTN
bins.description: Numerical index for B components in RTN coordinates
